news.title: 特朗普起诉国税局索赔百亿
news.title0: Trump and his sons sue IRS and US Treasury over leaked tax information
news.content: 特朗普及其两个儿子起诉美国国税局和财政部，索赔100亿美元，指控其未能阻止前承包商泄露其税务信息。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump and his two sons have filed a billion-dollar lawsuit against the federal government over leaks of their business and personal tax returns.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普威胁对加拿大飞机加征关税
news.title0: Trump threatens tariffs on Canada planes and nations selling oil to Cuba
news.content: 特朗普威胁对加拿大飞机加征50%关税，并计划对向古巴出售石油的国家征收新关税，加剧美加紧张关系。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has threatened to impose 50% tariffs on Canadian planes in retaliation for Canada "wrongfully, illegally, and steadfastly" refusing to certify a number of planes made by US firm Gulfstream.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普称伊朗需满足两条件避战
news.title0: Trump says 'it would be great' if US 'didn't have to use' military force on Iran
news.content: 特朗普表示已告知伊朗需满足“无核”和“停止杀害抗议者”两条件以避免军事行动，美军舰队正驶向波斯湾。
news.content0: Donald Trump says he has told Iran it has to do "two things" to avoid military action, as the US builds up its forces in the Gulf.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美元跌至四年新低或继续走弱
news.title0: Why the US dollar hit a four-year low and could fall further
news.content: 美元指数跌至四年新低，分析指市场担忧特朗普政府政策及海外投资机会增加，美元今年可能进一步贬值。
news.content0: After a dramatic 2025, when US President Donald Trump's tariff announcements sent the dollar tumbling, traders of the currency were expecting a quieter year.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 印尼情侣因违反伊斯兰法被鞭笞140下
news.title0: Indonesian couple caned 140 times for sex and alcohol offences
news.content: 印尼亚齐省一对情侣因发生婚外性行为及饮酒违反伊斯兰教法，在公开鞭刑中被鞭笞140下，女子当场昏厥。
news.content0: A couple in Indonesia has been caned 140 times for having sex outside marriage and drinking alcohol because it violates Sharia, or Islamic religious law.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 苹果iPhone 17销售强劲缓解AI担忧
news.title0: The iPhone 17 is easing Wall Street’s concerns about Apple’s AI troubles
news.content: 苹果最新财报远超预期，iPhone 17销售强劲，营收达853亿美元，缓解了市场对其在人工智能领域落后的担忧。
news.content0: As Big Techbattles for dominance in artificial intelligence, Apple is flying high on the success of the iPhone.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 林赛·沃恩冬奥前最后一滑严重摔伤
news.title0: Lindsey Vonn crashes in final downhill race before Winter Olympics
news.content: 美国滑雪名将林赛·沃恩在冬奥会前最后一场速降赛中严重摔伤，左膝受伤，一瘸一拐离开赛场。
news.content0: Lindsey Vonncrashed in her final downhill before theMilan Cortina Winter Olympicson Friday and was left limping and keeping weight off her left knee.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国试用者称Neuralink脑芯片“感觉神奇”
news.title0: Man given Musk's Neuralink brain chip in UK trial says it 'feels magical' and gives new hope
news.content: 英国首批Neuralink脑芯片试用者称其“感觉神奇”，为严重瘫痪患者带来新希望，该技术由马斯克公司开发。
news.content0: One of the first people in the UK to use Elon Musk's brain chip says it "feels magical" and believes it could transform the lives of those with severe paralysis.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 莫桑比克洪灾致社区断粮，救援艰难
news.title0: Mozambique: Aid workers scramble to reach starving communities after devastating floods but it's a mammoth task
news.content: 莫桑比克南部加扎省遭遇毁灭性洪灾，大片农田被淹，社区断粮，救援人员正艰难向被困民众空投食品援助。
news.content0: The broken banks of the Limpopo River are now faint snaking lines in a vast sea of brown, stagnant water that stretches out in every direction.
news.author: Sky News
